amendment.purpose: An amendment to the Porter amendment to to reduce the Forest Service construction account for forest road building by $5,600,000, rather than $41,500,000, and reduce the authorization for the Timber Purchaser Credit Program, which provides credits timber to companies as payment for building new forest roads) from $50 million to $25 million, rather than $1 million.

action.text: Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Dicks to the Porter amendment (A006).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Dicks amendment (A007) Agreed to by recorded vote: 211 - 209 (Roll no. 262).
